      • getUsersByOrderCount

        public java.util.List<com.vais.entities.User> getUsersByOrderCount(java.lang.Long countNumber)
        retrieves users from database sorted out by : how many orders was made up by each user. This method uses Criteria API .
        Parameters:
        countNumber - minimal number of orders made up by user
        Returns:
        List of user entities

      • getPaginatedUInfo

        public java.util.List<com.vais.models.UserInfo> getPaginatedUInfo(int max,
                                                                  int begin)
        Retrieves paginated data as entities list of UserInfo representation class . This method uses JPA Criteria IPA to construct query
        Parameters:
        max - number of record for one page
        begin - starting point in the database
        Returns:
        list of entities of UserInfo POJO representation class
